arts.ttl: Torino vs. Atalanta: both seek consistency
arts.sum: Ivan Juric is the former player of the day at the Olimpico Grande Torino: for him in Granata colors, the record is 44 wins, 37 draws, and 41 losses in 122 official matches from 2021/22 to 2023/24. In the last seven meetings in Turin, there has never been a draw between the two teams (Serie A matches only): Torino have won three and Atalanta four.
